body: @sakshamverma can you please upgrade to 4.1.43.Final and see if the problem still exists ? @amizurov did some fixes related to this as far as I remember.

Hi @sakshamverma , @normanmaurer, will look as soon as possible, also it will be great to have some reproducer or steps (websocket handshake request and sequence of frames). As well I try to check compression on latest autobahn testsuite.

@sakshamverma I think this is fixed by https://github.com/netty/netty/commit/491b1f428b00bba45a2c51d171cf819704b0fbe6#diff-30ed3b7e954d7e7b8509e71945b53430 . Please upgrade and report back if you still see the issue.
@normanmaurer it was another problem, I checked compression with latest autobahn testsuite and some test not passed, that depends on some last fragmented frames, i'll try to dig deeper and fix it.
Alight let me reopen it then @amizurov

issue.title: Fix #9770, last frame may contain extra data that doesn't affect decompression

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
Motivation:
Client can split data into different numbers of fragments and sometimes the last frame may contain trash data that doesn't affect decompression process.

Modification:
Added check if last frame is `ContinuationWebSocketFrame` and decompression data is empty
then don't throw an exception.

Also i'm not sure about https://github.com/netty/netty/issues/4348 is still relevant since not many cases left when it applicable. @normanmaurer WDYT ?

Result:
Fixes #9770
